member.name: P:FlyleafLib.AudioMaster.DefaultDeviceName

member.summary: Gets or sets the session's volume mute

member.summary: Minimum required demuxed packets before playing

member.summary: Maximum allowed errors before stopping

member.name: P:FlyleafLib.Config.Demuxer.VideoFormatFlags
member.summary: FFmpeg's format flags for video demuxer (see https://ffmpeg.org/doxygen/trunk/avformat_8h.html) eg. config.demuxer.VideoFormatFlags |= 0x40; // For AVFMT_FLAG_NOBUFFER

member.name: P:FlyleafLib.Config.Demuxer.SubsFormatFlags
member.summary: FFmpeg's format flags for subtitles demuxer (see https://ffmpeg.org/doxygen/trunk/avformat_8h.html)

FFmpeg's verbosity (24: Warning, 64: Max offset ...) (used only in DEBUG)
